categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave II

nodes.text: The Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features a detailed miniature of the Millennium Falcon. It was released on February 28, 2013 as part of the game's second wave of expansions.

Fly the legendary Millennium Falcon into fast-paced battles for the fate of the galaxy! The Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game allows players to blast through hyperspace with Han, Chewie, Lando, Nien Nunb, and more. The Millennium Falcon comes with four pilot cards, thirteen upgrades, and all requisite tokens. New rules expand the X-Wing galaxy to include large ships and modifications. With its pilots, upgrades, and lovingly detailed miniature, the Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack is a beautiful addition to the X-Wing game! (Not a Complete Game. X-Wing Core Set Required to Play.)
The Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack contains one miniature, plus a maneuver dial and action tokens, as well as pilot, upgrade, and reference cards.
Note: While all 4 YT-1300 Pilots have the Target Lock action, no Target Lock tokens are included.
